question: Who among the following are the Founders of Social Networking Site: “Twitter” ?
option1: Chris Hughes, Dustin Moskovitz, Eduardo Saverin, Mark Zuckerberg
option3: Biz Stone, Evan Williams, Noah Glass, Jack Dorsey
option4: Jawed Karim, Chad Hurley, Steve Chen
answer: Biz Stone, Evan Williams, Noah Glass, Jack Dorsey
explanation:
Founder of :-
“Twitter”: Biz Stone, Evan Williams, Noah Glass, Jack Dorsey
“Facebook”: Chris Hughes, Dustin Moskovitz, Eduardo Saverin, Mark Zuckerberg
“Google”: Larry Page, Sergey Brin
“Youtube”: Jawed Karim, Chad Hurley, Steve Chen
